nodes.text: Spaceworld was a source of entertainment on Coruscant during the Clone Wars. Advertisements, in the form of posters, were put up around the city in order to promote it. The posters were black and white, speckled with red, and showed an evil face with a large grin, with the name "Spaceworld" printed in Aurebesh characters.
Fifteen years after the Clone Wars ended, an old Spaceworld poster from the Clone Wars was used to decorate the walls of the Ghost.
